thread.title: BRIEF-Tempur Sealy International Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.79

title: BRIEF-Tempur Sealy International Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.79
text: February 22, 2018 / 12:21 PM / Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-Tempur Sealy International Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.79 Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Tempur Sealy International Inc: * TEMPUR SEALY REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.79 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.91 * Q4 SALES FELL 15.9 PERCENT TO $648.2 MILLION * TEMPUR SEALY - ‍FOR FULL YEAR 2018, CURRENTLY EXPECTS ADJUSTED EBITDA TO RANGE FROM $450 MILLION TO $500 MILLION.​ * TEMPUR SEALY - IN Q4 ‍COMPANY RECORDED A NET INCOME TAX BENEFIT OF $23.8 MILLION RELATED TO ENACTMENT OF TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT OF 2017 (“U.S. TAX REFORM”)​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
